name: War of Beach
description: This is an Early Access version that offers you to experience this game in advance. It is of great importance that we hope to have your advice and suggestions for our game, as we are willing to develop a game that belongs both you and us. Your precious idea will boost the development of this game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7 or 8 Processor: Dual-core 2.0 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 10 class GPU with 512MB VRAM Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space

reviews.review_text: Pay to Win Mobile game ported to Steam 30 FPS trash game
Complete ripoff from Bloom Beach, a game by supercell. Look even worse than the beta version of the original.

A sad little time suck game.Takes enourmous amount of time,with some units and buildings taking hours to complete.Has much potential,but with the bugs and very bad translations as well as little to no tutorials it slides into the 'as long as Im bored only' section of my library.If Id paid for this game,Id be so ♥♥♥♥♥♥.Worth the free price,but if it sells for more than .9 cents then you'll be getting ripped off.
IF IDIOTS stopped buying ingame gems and coins for real money.  there wouldn't be games like this anymore.  gamers2015.
A Boom Beach clone. It is not very fun to be honest. 4/10
Its like Boom Beach, and it doesn't really bring you in. It is just another of those forever taking time games.
Boom beach clone  you will get sued
clone of Boom Beach but 10 times worst

Good game, real glad I got this one, great game, pretty impressed, can't believe it, I need this guy, Gotta get this pic, on my phone, Good one, and I am proud, and I would add it, and it's true, good game, can't believe em, they did this so fast, I need you on my team, how's about this, 250 thousand, per annum
Total rip of Boom Beach but I like it. It is boom beach for my desk top!
Pretty cool game, (it recalls boom beach, but for computers, that's great) but................................... Diamondssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssss x)
its not a bad game. it does look a lot like boom beach but i dont mind
This game is fun to play and I have been working on it daily. I would like to see some Steam achievements and cards added to it.
yes it is a remake of boom beach but it is great if u don't have touch screen device
Great game, same concept as Boom Beach
This is a great game. It has truckloads of potential, and personally, I'd like to see some more of this great game! Love it! I recommend it.

While I have to agree with most others and say that this is a copy if boom beach, it is simply a version for PC. Thats what people dont realize. If you want ot stick to playing on your phones and ipads and what not, be my guest, but this is a good game. I tend to like these kind of games because it is kind of open world but you still have to upgrade stuff. Some people may agree with me on this but if you dont, thats your problem and your opinion. I felt like i needed to make this reveiw so that some people could see a good reveiw so the creators could get more downloads. This is a GOOD GAME for people who like little simple games like this. But i still agree with a lot of people in saying that it is a basic copy of Boom Beach.
4/5 would recomend to my friends, as we are kinda active on other games like this :)
Easy to play, Great fun. If you like boom beach you will love this.
I love this sandbox game.!!!
a good game , i like it very much
